column1: her home in Vale of Glamorgan shows she is "doing well". The 25-year-old has also added to her Instagram followers a series of pics of her in hospital. A friend of the ex-model has taken to social media to help Darcey. "I am doing so well but it's still not over yet," she wrote. "I am still recovering from my car crash and I have had so much to do and so much to ask for this year." Miss Wales Corria said she was so inspired by the pictures she shared on social media to take action. "I have been so inspired by the pictures and I am really looking forward to making the Miss World trip next year with our team of designers and designers," she added. "I am so happy and happy to be standing with you and to have you here with me." "The Miss World world is such a great, beautiful place. It's such an amazing place. "I'm so excited and I'm so excited to see what happens next year!"
